mapper.insert: insert into dish(id, name, category_id, price, code, image, description, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{code}, #{image}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{createUser})
mapper.select: select count(id) from dish where is_deleted = 0
select * from dish where category_id = #{categoryId} and status = 1
